user.title: A Better Route Planner
user.description: Enter your ABRP session information. See README for instructions on obtaining your session ID from the browser.

data_description.session_id: Your ABRP session ID from browser developer tools
data_description.vehicle_id: Optional: specific vehicle ID to monitor
data_description.api_key: Optional custom API key (leave default if unsure)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to ABRP. Please check your session ID and internet connection.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid session ID. Please obtain a fresh session ID from your browser.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This ABRP session is already configured
